273b4(mdo): tu/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcas pa 'di skad ces stond to// bcom ldan 'das nyag cig gtso bo'i mchog khams su pa ma thams cad mkhyend pa/ thams cad myi mnyam mnyam pa nyid
273b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// skye bo sbyi/ na gtong rang gi phyir/ nor rdzas byin cing lan yang re/ byams chen rgyal ba de myin te/ dgra gnyen byams sdang phan snyoms
273b6(mdo): mdzad/ rkang gnyis nang na rgyal ba btsun/ shes rab dpyan gsi mkhyend gzigs la/ brtson 'grus che la bdag skyabs mchi// lha gzhan shes rab de ma 'tshal/ 'das dang ma byon da ltar bzhugs
273b7(mdo): rgyal ba kun la bdag cag 'tshal/ de bzhin rgyal la skyabs gsold pa 'ang / dus gsum rgyal ba mchod pa bzhin/ de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rgyal bu dge mthong dang / kyi sum stong la/
273b8(mdo): tshigs su bcad de bstond pa/ gang zhig sangs rgyas 'grub 'dod pa/ mang du thos la 'brang bar byos/ bslob dpon dge la bkur byas la/ sangs rgyas 'grub pa yun gyi ring / gang zhig tshul khrims rnam
273b9(mdo): dag byed/ de ni dge slong yang dag yin// gang zhing stong pa sgom nus pa// de ni ting nge 'dzind thob ces bya/ gang zhig brtson 'grus khyod nus pa// de ni byang chub pyod pa'o// gang zhig mya ngan 'das gyur da/
274a1(mdo): de ni dge ba yang dag pa'o// tshul khrims ting nge 'dzind pa'i dge slong dang / rnam dag khrims 'dzinang dge slong ma zla ba phyed cing gso sbyong byos// chos gos rnam pa lus gyo nad to// lhung zed sreg shang
274a2(mdo): thogs nas su// rnam dag bsod snyoms 'gro byas na/ lha rnams kun kyang dga' 'gyur bas/ thal mo sbyar zhing gus phyag 'tshal// ngas kyang lha dang myi rnams kund/ de'i bya ba'i byed du gzhug/ dper
274a3(mdo): ma/ lha bran thams cad kyis/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin la/ rim 'gro gus par byed pa bzhin// da ltar 'phral du 'ang lan thob ste/ phyi ma'i dus su 'ang dpag tu myed/ rab tu byung zhing khrims 'jand pa
274a4(mdo): sangs rgyas drin lan ldon zhes bya/ rgyal bu dge mthong 'di dalta ste/ nga dang sems dpa' ma gtogs par/ 'jig rten pa'i myi kun kyang / rnam dag dad pa'i sems bskyed do// phyogs
274a5(mdo): bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag kun/ mya ngan myi 'da' rtag tu bzhu gas/ chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin te/ de ltar mngon par/ shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas drin lan ldon zhes bya ba// rgyal
274a6(mdo): bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten pa'i myi dag kun/ rnam par 'byed pa'i sems myed cing / theg pa cig lam mngon par shes/ 'das pa dang ni 'ongs pa/ phyogs bcu dang ni da
274a7(mdo): sA'i rnams// sangs rgyas theg cen gcig pu la/ gac+doMs sam/ gsum zhes bya myed par/ de ltar yid la bskyed nas su// sems kyis rnam par gyi rtog ya/ de lta bu'i mying rnams ni/ rgyas pa'i
274a8(mdo): drin yan ldon zhes bya/ rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ gang zag la la 'ga' zhig gis/ sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das phyi na rtag tu dad pa'i sems bskyed de/ sems can kun la sangs rgyas kyi/ bdag
274a9(mdo): nyid yod par bshad pa ni/ de lta bu'i gang zag rnams rgyal ba'i drin lan ldon zhes bya/ gang zhig skad cig dge khyod tsapi/ lga'i 'bras bu myo re ste/ cig car bla myed lam bsgrubs na/ rgyal ba'i drin lan sngon
274b1(mdo): zhes bya/ rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das phyin/ gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig gis/ yud tsam mdo sde 'di blangs ste/ dkon mchog gsum la gus byas shing / mkhas la sri zhu tshid/
274b2(mdo): byas ma/ de lta bu'i gang zag rnams// rgyas pa'i drin lan ljon zhes bya/ gang zhig nor rdzas snga 'ga' 'am/ kha zas dang ni gos kyi rnams// kun la khyab par sbyin byas ma/ rgyal ba'i drin lan sngon zhes bya/ rgyal bu
274b3(mdo): dge mthong 'di lta ste/ nga'i chos rnams 'jig pa na/ gang zhig 'ga' la blo bstand nas/ yud tsam mdo sde 'di mnyan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'bum brgyal la/ mchod pas phul bas de lhag go// theg chen mdo/
274b4(mdo): sde 'di dag kyang / sangs rgyas byang chub kun kyi yum/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / mdo sde 'di la dran byas te/ snyoms sems phan tshun gnyis myed na/ rgyal ba'i drin lan ldan zhes bya// rgyal
274b5(mdo): bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ gang zhig chos 'di 'dzind pa'i tshe/ rgyal bu'i drin lan blan 'dod pa dang / skad cig yud tsam sgo/ ma byed pa/ stong khams gang ba'i sems can gyi// srog
274b6(mdo): gi sbyin pa byed pas/ bsam gtan sgom pa yon tan che/ gang zhigabasgom la bskur ba dang / dge 'dun 'khrugs par byed pa na stong khams gsum po gang ba'i/ myi rnams kyi ni srog bcad
274b7(mdo): dang / srog chags thams cad bsad dang 'dra/ de sdig yang ni de bzhin no// gang zhig dge sbyong mthong ba la/ bskur ba 'debs shing ma dad pa/ dkon mchog gsum gi rigs gcod pas/ de ni rgyal ba'i lan
274b8(mdo): myi ljon// de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang / myi sum stong po/ bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstand par gnang ba/ dka' bas tshim nas bstand pa nyid spyi bos blangs te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces
274b9(mdo): gsold to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bsta nad pa la/ gang mad lags shing gang myi mdo/ mad dang myi mad gnyi ga yang / dngos por dmyigs su yong ma mchis/ yang dag mtshwa ni de lta bu/ chos rnams kund dang ma
275a1(mdo): ma 'gal lo// sems can kun la byams slad du/ thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ 'phags pa gang nas byon pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ang de nas byond/ yang dag mtshan nyid ji lta ba/
275a2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa 'ang de bzhin no// 'phags pa kun gyi bden tshig ltar/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ang de bzhin bshad/ de'i slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ de bzhin gshegs pa shes bgyi ba lags/ bzod pa'i go cha brtan
275a3(mdo): ba'i sems/ sra ba'i bzhu stobs brtson 'grus che/ rno ba'i mda' ni shes rab bgyogs/ le lo'i dgra rnams 'joms mdzad cing / 'jig rten lha dang myi rnams kyi// mchod yon phul ba bshes pas na/ de'i
275a4(mdo): srad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba lags rab tu sdug bsngal mtshan nyid mkhyend// sdug bsngal rgyu yang shind tu mkhyen/ sdug bsngal zhi ba'i mtshan nyid la/ zhi ba'i
275a5(mdo): tshul yang rab tu mkhyen / 'phags pa'i bden bzhi mkhyend/ pas na/ 'gyur ba ma mchis bden par nges// de bas phyog/ sa bcu'i nang na yang / mtshan ni yang dag rdzogs shes bgyi
275a6(mdo): rig pa gsum po mchog brnyes pas/ khyod lam rnam dag dang ya nga ldan/ de skad mtshan ni bcom ldan 'das mkhyend dang zhabs su ldan zhes bgyi/ chos rnams thams cad kund mkhyend cing / dam
275a7(mdo): ba'i chos nyid rab bsnyes pas/ thams cad kun la byams slad du/ dus skabs sbyar cing thabs kyis bshad/ skye rgaya 'chi ba sprul cing / bde ba'i gnas su rgya nad par mdzad// de'i slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan
275a8(mdo): bde bar gshegs pa bgyi bgyi ba'i lags/ 'jig rten gang nas mchis pa dang / 'jig rten pas pa'i mtha' yang mkhyend/ de'i slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ 'jig rten mkhyend ces bgyi ba lags/ thug rje chen
275a9(mdo): pos sems can bsgral/ mnyan des dge ba bstand cing btul/ de'i slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ skyes bu 'dul pa kha lo sgyur/ tshul khrims ting nge 'dzin dashes rab s+yan/ thub pa'i bla ru 'da' ba myed// de'i
275b1(mdo): slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan bla na myed ces bgyi ba lags/ nyon mongs kyi shes rab ldan/ rnam grol dam pa mchog bshad pas/ de'i slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ lha dang myi'i stond ces bgyi/ dus sum g.yo ma myi g.yo ba
275b2(mdo): bas samal pas chos kun kyang / byang chub shing drub kun mkhyend pas/ de'i slad du mtshan rgyas sangs// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams/ sku 'phrul chen po'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas/ skum
275b3(mdo): mkha'i la 'phags te/ zhal so so nas tshig mthun par 'di skad ces bka' stsa lang to// kye rgyal bu dge mthong dang / myi sum stong po khyed rnams kyi sdig gi rang bzhin ni/ nang na'ang myi gnas/ phyi rol dan/
275b4(mdo): yang myi gnas/ bar na yang myi gnas so// sems brtan pa 'i phyir/ dge ba'i mthu yang myi brtan to// sems rnam par grol ba'i phyir/ sdig pa'i rang bzhin yang rnam par grol lo// shes
275b5(mdo): rab stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sdig gi rang bzhin yang stong pa nyid do// dad pa'i mthu che ba'i phyir/ bsod nams kyi mthu yang che'o// de// bzhin du mthol bshad ste/ 'gyod tshangs su nus pa ni/ nged rnam
275b6(mdo): mthong ba'i steng du/ sangs rgyas rin mang dang / sprulang pa'i sku thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'gyod tshangs kyis sdig bskyar sa bas/ rgyund tu nga yang mthong la// deng byang chub sems dpa
275b7(mdo): nams la bstan bcos pa dang 'dra bas/ de bzhin du 'gyod tshangs byas pa ning dang spruld pa rnams dang / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen yang las sogs pa thams cad kyang dges par 'gyur ro// phyogs
275b8(mdo): bcu tus sum gi sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / mchod pa byas par 'gyur te/ de dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur te/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde 'di'i rjes su byang chub tu chud par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis
275b9(mdo): 'khor zhwa 'bring ba rnams la bka' stsas pa// sdig can rnams kyis sdig bshags par 'dod na/ rgyal bu dge mthong bzhin du/ dus sum gyi sangs rgyas dang mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge
276a1(mdo): 'dun chen po rnams la/ re re nas dmyigs de phyag 'tshal ba/ nga dang phrad pa dang 'dra ba 'am/ mthong ba dang 'dra bar 'du shes skyed de/ sangs rgyas gcig gam/ sangs rgyas gnyis sam/ sangs
276a2(mdo): rgyas bcu 'am/ sangs rgyas brgya 'am/ sangs rgyas stong ngam// sangs rgyas khri 'am// sangs rgyas grangs myed pa'i 'du shes su bskyed de/ mthong ba dang 'dra bar dmyigs la/ de bzhin du re re nas sems kyis
276a3(mdo): phyag 'tshal nas/ de dag gi bsod nams dpag tu myed pa yang 'thob par 'gyur la/ 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba thams cad kyang se lad par byed do// bskal pa grangs myed pa'i bar du ngan song sum du
276a4(mdo): ltung bar myi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la bde bar gnas pa ra 'gyur ba yang des the tsom myed do// de'i phyir sdig pa rnam sa 'thol shing bshags par byas la/ sems thag pa nas dang
276a5(mdo): pa bskyed nas/ gdon myi za bar sdig 'byang bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang / myi sum stong gis cig char du skad bskyed de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de bstod
276a6(mdo): pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byams shing thugs rje che/ shag kya'i gdung rigs chos kyi rje/ tshogs kyi nang na se ge sgras/ khyab par sems can bsdus pa ni/ pa la gzigs
276a7(mdo): pa bu cig bzhin du/ rnam par 'byed pa yong ma mchis// de lta bu'i bla myed pa/ mthong nas de srad gus phyag 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal bu dge mthong dang / myi sum stong rnams la 'di
276a8(mdo): skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed rnams 'di ltar 'gyod tshangs byas te/ myi 'chang ba'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshags pas ga de ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// khyod rnams ma 'ongs
276a9(mdo): pa'i dus na/ gdon mya za bar sangs rgyas su 'grub bo// rigs kyi bu yang 'di lta ste/ nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gang zhig sems zag pa nas/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
276b1(mdo): mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal bar nus pa ni/ dkon mchog gsum gi drin gi lan lon zhes bya ste/ de ma thag du myi dge bcu dang / mtshams myed pa lnga dang
276b2(mdo): mnyam pa nyid la bskur ba'i sdig 'byang bar 'gyur nas// rgyu nad tu zhugs par 'os pa ni/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no// lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'os pa ni/ la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no// phyir
276b3(mdo): myi 'ong bar 'os pa'i ni/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no// dgra bcom par 'os pa ni/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no// rang sangs rgyas su 'os pa ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu sbyin no// byang chub sems
276b4(mdo): dpar 'os pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu sbyin no// ltar mdo sde 'di'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams skye ba cig gis yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid thob par yang
276b5(mdo): phyogs bcu'i dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba'i/ yin no// byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gnyis kyis chos kyi / byings thob pa dang / dus gsum gi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag
276b6(mdo): 'tshal ba'i yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sa yang dag pa me thar phyi nad pa'i ye shes thob pa yang / dus gsum gi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no// byang chub sems dpa'
276b7(mdo): pa las don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud pa yang / dus gsum gi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no// byang chub sems dpa' la las 'das par 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang ldan pa yang
276b8(mdo): dus gsum gi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no// byang chub sems dpa' la las nam mkha' ting nge 'dzind dang ldan pa yang // dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i
276b9(mdo): yin no// byang chub sems dpa' la las phyir myi ldog pa'i bzod pa dang / chos bzhin gi bzod pa dang / chos bzhin gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yang / dus gsum gi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i
277a1(mdo): yin no// byang chub sems dpa' la las gzungs dran pa chen po'i sems dang / rang gis rig pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i
277a2(mdo): yin no// byang chub sems dpa' la las seng ge sgra'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzind dang / ye shes lnga'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind dang ldan pa yang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la
277a3(mdo): phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no// byang chub sems dpa' la las mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyod lam dang
277a4(mdo): ldan pa yang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas na rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rje 'jam dpal gyis/ bcom
277a5(mdo): ldan 'das lnga 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'ang/ sa sems can thams cad nor cing 'khrul pa'i sems 'khru gA ste/ myi dge ba dang mtshams ma mchis pa rnams/
277a6(mdo): sngar bgyis na sdig rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldana'i ngas kyis 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ gong cu bstan du yin te/ gang la las phyogs su sangs rgyas pa'i chos na
277a7(mdo): grangs 'di // phyogs bcu cus gsum gi sangs rgyas dang / mad sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa' rams kyimatshan thos nas/ dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba bskyes la// dad pa dang gum
277a8(mdo): dpag tu byed pas blangs sam/ 'chang ngam// klog gas// 'dond ta meH yi ker bris sam/ kun chub par byas ste/ dbem pa'i gnas khang pa gcig gi nang du dkyil 'khor byas la/ dri chus chag chag
277a9(mdo): btab ste/ phan gdugs bzang pos rgya dad cing / phog spos zhim po bsregs na rgyal ba rnams la brgyan drang zhing / gshegs su gsol pa yang yang rung / nyung yang rung / byan drangs nas/ bdag khrus
277b1(mdo): gdus par byas la/ gos gtsang ma gyon zhing / land cig phyi ro yod me chu su 'gron/ khrus lan cig byas te/ seng ge'i khri bcugs nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du ba sgoms la/ chos kyi mtsham nyid
277b2(mdo): lnga bdag dang / gang zag dang / sems can las stsogs pa'i lta ba myed par mngon par rdzogs par byas ste/ dang po bas bye brag phyed cing gsal bar brjod par bya'o// de nas dri spros zhim po bsregs la @/
277b3(mdo): sems gsal zhing / dran pa yang dag pa dang / bsam pa yang dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa la sems cag du bsam mo/ de ltar dpyod pa rnams mthun zhing 'dum pa ni mchog ste/ de la myi mthun zhing chod pa ni/
277b4(mdo): 'thol tshangs su myi 'gyur ro// 'khro ba des kun 'jigs par byed de/ khyod lam dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po dra ngan bzhing don dam pa bsams la/ nyin mtshan bdun ga bar du
277b5(mdo): nyal zhing gnyid log tu myi rung ngo // nyin gcig kyang dus ga sum du mdo sde 'di kha don nam/ glog pa nyid mtshan dus dru/ ga du byas la/ dri gsung gis mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas/
277b6(mdo): 'thol tshangs su byas te/ mdo 'di nyid mi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dang / mde sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan brjod cing / seMs zag pan gyi thug pa dag tshes pag pa da kyi nong ba dang / sa lag panas phyig yeng ba dang / tshes pag pa dang dus kI grus pa dang / sems lag pa nas nyid cig pas nyid
277b7(mdo): cig 'grus pa dang / sems zag pa nas dad pa bskyed pa dang / sems zag pa nas dga' ba bskyed pa dang / sems thag pa nas rim pa bskyed pa dang / sems zag pa nas rgyu nad kyi 'chad pa dang / sems thag
277b8(mdo): swa nas gzab pa dang / sems zag pa nas myi 'bral ba dang sems thag pa nas sdig pasam pa dang / sems zag pa nas sangs rgyas dran pa dang / sems zag pa nas chos dran pa dang / seMs zag pa nas dge 'dun dran pa dang
277b9(mdo): sems zag pa nas tshul khrims dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas gtong ba dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas don dam pa'i lha dram pa ste/ de dag ni de bzhin du klog pa dang / de bzhin du phyag bya
278a1(mdo): de bzhin du sems thag pa nas so sor 'chags shing 'thol kha thog ma'i nyin par nas zhag rgyug tu lon pa 'das dri chus chag chag btab ste// sus yang spos chus bkrus par bya'o// pog spos bzang
278a2(mdo): po sregs cing / sems zab mos mchod pa byas pa/ de dag de lta bur sems thag pa nas/ so sor 'thol zhing bshags pas/ phyogs bcur bskul bar gyur da te/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na/ sangs rgyas dpag
278a3(mdo): tu myed pa gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu myed pa gang ga krung gi bye ma snyed dang 'grogs te/ sgra dbyangs kyi rjes su khang bu de'i nang du phyi nad cing mngon tu grub pa'i dbang bya'o// /
278a4(mdo): de bzhin du nyin mtshan bdun gi bar du byas na/ gdon myi za bar bya byung bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar sdig 'byung bar shes she na/ se so'i skye ba rnams kyis don dam par da dung ma grub pas
278a5(mdo): rmyis ltas kyi mtshan ma la rtags su byas ste/ rmyi lam rnam// cig rmyis na/ mtshams myed pa rnam cig 'byung ngo // rmyi la// ma rnam lnga rmyis na mtshams myed pa lnga 'byang ste/ des nub mo
278a6(mdo): rmi lam na chu klung chen po brgal bar 'dod de zam pa chen po'i steng du 'gro ba rmyis na/ de ni nges par rnam par grol ba thob pa yin no// gal te de'i rmyi lam na gzhan gis bdag la khrus bya ba
278a7(mdo): dang / lus char bab par rgyas na/ de ni nges par rnam par dag pa thob pa yin no// gal te de'i rmyi lam na/ bdag dge 'dun mang po'i nang du zhugs te gral tu 'dug par myis na/ de ni nges par sangs
278a8(mdo): rgyas kyi slob ma yang dag par gyurd to// gal te de'i rmyi lam na bdag mchod rten nam gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan mthong bar gyis na/ de ni chos
278a9(mdo): kyi sgo mo nges par zhugs par gyur to// gal te rang gis shing rtog rnyed cing zabagyis na/ de ni tshe 'di nyid la yon tan gi 'bras bu 'grub par mngon no// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jas dpal la bkas
278b1(mdo): sprul pa/ gal te dge slong ngam/ dge sbyong ma 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' dad pa can gang la las dran pa nyams te/ nor cing 'khrul pas/ sdom pa'i tshul khrims re re nas zhig par ma nyams pa/ de bzhin du so
278b2(mdo): sor chags shing 'thol na sdig kyi 'byang kyi srid de/ sems zag pa nas ma byas pa ni ma rtogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jidu gis 'di skad ces zhus so// bcom ldan 'das cho ga 'di ltar ba'i tshe/ kyi
278b3(mdo): mang na rung ngam nyung ma rung / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kyi gcig yang chad nyi shu man chad rung ngo // cho ga 'di pyod pa'i tshe/ mdo gzhan mi bsam mo// de ltar 'thol tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu phyin
278b4(mdo): cad nyes kyi byed na/ nga mi 'thol tshangs shes bya'o// de ltar dram par gyis shig/ bdag cag rnams da ltar 'chi ba las slar 'tsha ba dang 'dra bas/ da ni bdag tshul khrims bsrung ngo // da ni bdag
278b5(mdo): ba tshon 'grus spyod do// da ni bdag theg pa chen po'i mdo sde klog pa dang / kha don bgyi'o zhes de'i tshe de'i dus na dran pa de// star gyis shig/ bdag deng nas sdom pa bzung ba ni/ rdo rje
278b6(mdo): 'dra bar sran thub par smond to// des de ltar dran pa'i tshe/ skyes bu dam pa dri ma myed par grags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu myed pa dang / lhan cig tu de'i mdun du 'greng ste/ dpa
278b7(mdo): du byed do// 'phags pa kun du bzang po yang 'gyod tshangs kyi mkhan po byed do// 'phag pa 'od srung yang zhu gnas gi rten byed do// 'jam dpal 'di ni sdig pa sbyangs pa zhes bya'o// 'di rnam par grol
278b8(mdo): pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni gnas thob pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal
278b9(mdo): to// gang la la zhig gis rtsa ba bzhi dang / gang la la zhag gas rtsa ba bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad dang / sdom pa byed can dang / khrims bcu dang / gsum la skyabs su song ba dang / khrims lnga dang / dge ba bcu dang /
279a1(mdo): tshul khrims dang / 'dul ba re re nas/ zhig pa'am/ nyis pa'i mtshams myed pa lnga byas pa 'am/ mnyam pa nyid
279a2(mdo): bskur ba'i sngag byas pa zhig yod pa de log pyod ma gtogs par/ so sor ma bshags ma mthong na/ byi de che 'phos ma thag tu gdon mya za bar mnar myed pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro//
279a3(mdo): 'jam dpal gis gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji'i slad du mnar ma mchis pa'i dmyal ba zhes bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du de ci'i rgyu ci'i rkye nad kyis ltung
279a4(mdo): ba dang / dmyal ba'i dbyibs che chung dang / rnam par sbyind pa'i sdug bsngal bskal pa'i grangs ji tsam gi par tu gnas par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
279a5(mdo): pa/ 'jam dpal shi nad tu yang mkhas so// shind tu 'ang ma/ khas so// don 'di lta bu dri ba yang shind tu mkhas te/ ye/ gas par nyon la phal mo rnams kyang legs par soms shig/
279a6(mdo): ngas bye brag phyed par bshad do// ji ltar mnar myed pa'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya zhe na/ skad cig kyang mnar zhing stir myed pa 'i phyir/ mnar myed pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o// gcig tu na dgag/
279a7(mdo): pa 'am/ 'or ba bya ba 'ang myed/ 'gyur ba yang byed/ tsha ba ni rab tu tsha/ sdug bsngal ba ni shi nad tu'ang myi bzad pa/ skad cig kyang myi ngal skad cig kyang myi sdod/ myi ngal myi sdod cing bar skabs myed pa'i phyir
279a8(mdo): mnar myed par dmyal ba zhes bya'o// yang rnam pa cig tu ni mye chen po 'bar ba rab tu tsha ba/ kun tu 'bar ba rab tu 'bar zhing mched pa/ khong du zhugs pa'i phyir/ mnar myed pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o// brtse
279a9(mdo): ldan 'das kyis yang 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi dmyal ba chen po mngam byed pa'i dbyibs yi/ gru ba'i skam pa dpag tshad brgyad khri yod de lugs kyi rab rim pa mdun gyis bskor cing / steng /
279b1(mdo): du yang lcag ces mi ngas gis g.yog ste/ 'og tu bar chad bco brgyad yod do// de'i kho ra khor yug tu ral gi rim pa bdun gis bskor to// lcags kyi rab rim pa bdun gi nang logs su nags tshal ral gi lo
279b2(mdo): ma can yod ngo // lcags kyi khang pa bar cad bco brgyad po cig mar 'dug ste/ rim pa brkyad khri bzhi stong yod ngo // de'i grwa bzhir zangs kyi khyi chen blon po bzhi 'dug pa lus kyi bong chod ni 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi bcus/
279b3(mdo): myig ni grog gi 'phreng ba bzhin// mche ba ni ral gyi sdong po dang 'dra/ so ni spu gri bsdams pa'i ri dang mtshungs/ lce ni lcags kyi mchil ma bzhin// sder mo ni lcags kyi gsal shing dang mtshungs// mjug ma ni lcags
279b4(mdo): kyi sprul dang 'dra/ spu'i bu ga re re nas 'bar ba'i mye shi nad tu mched cing kun tu 'bar ba rab tu 'bar bar 'byung ste/ de'i dud pa mnam pa ni 'jig rtenag rdzas mnam pa gang dang yang bskrun
279b5(mdo): tu byed do// dmyal ba de'i sgo bzhi la sgo re re na dmyal ba'i sku/ ngas ma bco brgyad 'dug go// mgo ni srin po'i mgo/ kha/ ni srin po'i kha dang 'dra ste/ mgo la rA bco brgyad yod pa
279b6(mdo): lag na lcags kyi gsal shing // thogs so// ra ba rim pa btu na gi rang logs su lcags kyi rgyas mtshan grangs byed pa zhig yod de/ rgyal mtshan gi mgor mye 'byung ba ni/ chu myig 'byung /
279b7(mdo): ba dang 'dra bar 'byung / lcags 'ju ba'i khu ba 'bab pa ni/ kun tu khyab par bab ste/ dmyal ba'i sgo bzhin sgo re re'i ste na zangs po che bco brgyad yod pa'i nang na lcags khol ba'i khu ba khar lud cing
279b8(mdo): sgo bzhir bab pa/ dmyal ba'i nang du gang bar bab po// khang pa bar chad re re'i nang na yang lcags kyi sprul chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pas khar 'dug pa'i mye skyug cing ra ba kun tu gang bar gtong ngo
279b9(mdo): sprulang gi sgra sgrogs pa ni/ 'brug sgra chen po zor ba bzhin no// lcags kyi thu lum chen po'ichar bab pa yang sngar myed pa kun tu gang ngo // der sdug bsngal myi bzad pa ni 'bum phrag brgyad khri'i sdug
280a1(mdo): // bsngal gi nang masug bsngal myi bzad pa'i nang na kun kyang der 'dus te/ de 'bru byed do/ dang byed pa'i dmyal ba de'i sgo ba'ir na re re'i gyi rol tu 'bam pan gyi 'i nga tu ma med cing yang ba/ rdo bya / nub bskor dang byed par nu'o// yar ba snga grags kyi rab ga'o mun dag pad kyad sri na stong sngags kyi ba la drug gi ra
280a2(mdo): thal/ mar thal zhing bla 'og dang / phyogs bzhir kun tu 'bar ba rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur te/ sdug bsngal cig char ldang ba ni gong du smos pa bzhin no// za ba bzhi dang / sdom pa brkyang 'jig pa dang / mtshams byed
280a3(mdo): pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur pa 'bebs pa rnams dang / mdo sde 'di las 'byung bzhin 'thol tshangs ma byas la/ gnod bkur ba 'am/ khrel ba myed na/ mya de tshe 'phos ma thag tu stobs tshan po che'i dpung
280a4(mdo): pab brgyang zhing bskums pa tsam gyis/ mnar myed pa'i dmyal nga bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// lus kyang de'i nang du gang ste/ tsha bas gzir bas phongs nas kha gdangs myig btsums/ myig
280a5(mdo): gdangasakha btsums kyang / kha 'thams pas/ sma ma nus so// de sdig mang ba'i phyir/ ral gi 'khor lo grangs/ myed pa du ma zhig/ nam mkha' nas char bzhin bab ste
280a6(mdo): klad par phyogs cir rkang par byung ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni sngar gong du bshad pa bzhin brgyang stong khri phrag du bsgyur ba'o// gang la las chab bzhi po tshang par zhig par gyurapasdug
280a7(mdo): bsngal chen po nyams su myong ba ni/ bskald pa chen po lnga rdzogs kyi bar du'o// sdom pa brgyad 'jig pa ni de las gyur so// sa mang ngo // mtshams myed pa lnga yang gyu rad cig gis mang ngo //
280a8(mdo): ba kyi mdo sde la bskur ba 'debs pa yang gyur cig gis mang ngo // dkon mchog gsum la smad pa dang / dge 'dun gyi nor rkus pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma tshangs par byed pa la/ dri ma can
280a9(mdo): du dpyod pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon la dbang za ba dang / ma la g.yems pa rnams kong sa dag las kyang gyurd cig gis bskyed do// log 'byod gi rnams ni dge ba'i cha ba gtan chad pas rnams kyang
280b1(mdo): mnam myed pa'i dmyal ba nas kyi bar du pa ni der sa gtogs so// de las sogs pa'i mig can rnams sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i na/ 'ab ba'i kyi na tu ma ched cing khong du zhugs te/ rmugs nas
280b2(mdo): 'chi'o// de nas srin po dmyal ba'i srungs mas/ lugs kyi gsal shing sa la brda' ste/ sos sos shes bos pa dang / bos pa'i sgra bzhin du yang sos yang sos nas/ nyin mtshan gcig sa lan
280b3(mdo): khri ni 'chi/ lam khri ni 'tsho ste/ sdug bsngal myi bzad pa chen po nyams su myong ba'i gong du bstand pa bzhin no// nam cig mnar myed pa'i dmyal ba nas slar phyinang na yang / tshul khrims 'jigs pa
280b4(mdo): dang / yon bdag dad pa can gyi sbyin pa grangs pa'i las kyis yang dmyal ba chung ngu rnams kyi nang du 'jug ste/ de la dmyal ba grang slebs pa dang / dmyal ba mun nag pa dang dmyal ba rab tu tsha ba dang
280b5(mdo): dmyal ba'i spu gri so bsdams pa dang / dmyal ba ral ga' khor lo dang / dmyal ba mye'i shing rta can dang / dmyal ba phyi/ sa'i 'dam dang / dmyal ba chu can dang / dmyal ba skye mar yu
280b6(mdo): klung dang / dmyal ba nags tshal gri lo ma can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi zhwa la ma li ka ba can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi 'khri can dang
280b7(mdo): dmyal ba lcags kyi 'khor lo dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi phug dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi thu lum dang / dmyal ba bsdus gzhom zug ri cen dang / dmyal ba zangs khu krung dang / 'di rnams so sor re re'i nang/
280b8(mdo): du yang lo khri phrag brgyad brgya'i bar du ston spongs nas gdod tha rad te/ 'on kyang rtag tu ma rabs su skyes lnga/ tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du dkon mchog gsum gyi sgra myi thos so// brgya la dge
280b9(mdo): ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad na ni/ byang chub tu sems bskyed kyang srad/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma phrad na ni/ slar yang dmyal bar ltung ngo // nyes byas kyi sdig pa rnams ma 'thol ma gshegs na/
281a1(mdo): dmas pa sdug bsngas myong ba yang / rgyas chen ris bzhi'i lha'i lo grangs ka khur lo khri mag brgya'i bar du nyams su stong bar 'gyur ro// de ltung ba rnams kyi sdig pa ni/ nga gnyis/ de las gta
281a2(mdo): gyurab tu bskyed do// dge 'dun gi lpag ma yang de las gnyis kyu rang du skyed do// sdig can de dag gi sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i tshe/ tshig gzhan myi phyi rad te/ a pa pa/ a ta ta/ a lA la/ ma pa ba//
281a3(mdo): 'ba' shig zer zhing 'dug go// de bas na sdig nan rnams rings par so sor 'grol gang gshegs la/ dkon mchog gsum gi sbubs su song kyis shig/ 'jam dpal yang 'di lta ste/ sdig pa myur du bsngal
281a4(mdo): 'byung bar 'dod na/ mdo sde 'di'i nang nas 'byung bzhin du so so ngar 'thol bshegs te/ 'gyod tshangs byas shig/ cho ga nyid 'ag bdud pa dun ki bar du nyin cig tha gcig du byas la/ yang dag pas
281a5(mdo): rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i 'dren pas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs/ rgyas su 'grub pa'i che/ myi chen po'i mtshan dang / mngon par 'a/ tshang rgya ba'i mtshan dang / gyi g.yo ba'i mtshan dang / rnam par grol
281a6(mdo): ba'i mtshan dang / 'od gzer cang gi mtshan dang / ye shes yongs su rgyas pa'i mtshan dang / pha rol phyind pa rnams dang ldan pa'i mtshan da / dpa' bar 'gro ba las stsogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i
281a7(mdo): mtshan rnams bsam par bya'o// yang gcig tu na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i yid dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ yid 'gog pa'i bar du 'dzind tu 'jug par bya'o// yid 'gog
281a8(mdo): pa'i ting nge 'dzind las langs te/ slar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzind las langs te/ shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzind la 'jug/ shes
281a9(mdo): rab sgom pa las langs te/ chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind la 'jug/ chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid las langs te/ mtshan ma 'od gzer can ki ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ mtshan ma 'od gzer can
281b1(mdo): las langs te/ seng ge'i pha ro'i ting nge 'dzind la 'jug/ seng ge'i pha ro las langs te/ seng ge'i sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzind la 'jug/ seng ge spru lad pa las langs te/ rgya mtsho yid kyi ting nge 'dzind pa
281b2(mdo): 'jug/ rgya mtshon yid las langs te/ kum tu ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ kun tu ye shes las langs te/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind la 'jug/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i las langs ste/ kun du
281b3(mdo): snang ba'i lus gzugs can gyi ting nge 'dzind lnga 'jug/ kun tu snang ba'i lus gzugs can las langs ste/ chos kyi dbyis kyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzind la 'jug/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes gi ting nge 'dzin
281b4(mdo): las langs te/ seng ge'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzind la 'jugaseng ge'i rgyal po las langs ste/ chos kyi rgyal po'i ting nge 'and la 'jug/ chos kyi rgyal ba las langs te/ bdud rnams kyi
281b5(mdo): mtshan ma 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ bdud rnams/ kyi mtshan ma 'gog pa las langs te/ stong pa nyid kyi zhe sa rab kyi ting nge 'dzind la 'jug/ stong pa nyid kyi shes rab
281b6(mdo): las langs te/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin de tu 'jug/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa las langs te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzind la 'jug/ chen po
281b7(mdo): stong pa nyid kyi ye shes las langs ste/ gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i lus gzugs can gting nge 'dzind la 'jug/ gnas thams cad khyab pa'i lus gzugs can las langs te/ sems kyi mtshan nyid la
281b8(mdo): rnam par rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzind la 'jug/ sems kyi mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind la 'jug/ byang chub sems dpa'
281b9(mdo): sems dpa' chen po 'ardo rje'i mtshan nyid las langs te/ rdo rje gcig tor gi ting nge 'dzind la 'jug/ rdo rje gtsug tor las lasang ste/ rgya mtsho thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzind la 'jug/ rgya mtsho thams cad las langs te/
282a1(mdo): gzungs kyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ gzungs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho las langs ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzind la 'jug/ sangs rgyas
282a2(mdo): thams cad kyi spyod yul rgya mtsho las langs ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i rgya mtshon ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par
282a3(mdo): grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i rgya mtsho las langs ste/ 'dod thams kyis ting nge 'dzind mtha' myed pa'i rgya mtsho'i sgor 'jug par bya'o// mtha' myed mu myed pa'i rgya mtsho sgo las
282a4(mdo): langs te/ yid 'gog pa dang zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ yid 'gog pa dang zhi ba las langs te/ rdo rje gdon myi za ba rnamapar grol ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzind la 'jug par bya'o// 'jam
282a5(mdo): dpal nga mya ngan las 'das pa la ga tu/ rigs kyi bu 'am ri/ gas kyi bu mo gang la las dad pa skad cig pa'i sems bskyed/ de/ mdo sde 'di yi ger bri ba 'am/ klog pa 'am/ kha don du
282a6(mdo): skad mar dran te/ bsam pa'i 'du shes dang / dran pa'i 'du shes dang rtog pa'i 'du shes su dad pa'i sems grub na/ skad cig mar ba skal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bye brag gu bcu'i gang ga'i bye ma snyed
282a7(mdo): kyi 'khor ba'i sdig phyir bsnyil par 'gyur ro// ma rig pas bslabs pa dang / gtan bral bar 'gyur ro// de bas na de bzhin gshegs rtag tu 'tsho skyong zhing bzhes te/ mya ngan las myi 'da' bar mngon no// /
282a8(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la tshig su bcad de bka' stsald pa// yid dgas mthu chen thams cad dang / dud 'gro glang po ma rungs dang / bud myed g.yem dang ma rungs rlung / bdag tu
282a9(mdo): myed pa'i ma rungs rnams// ba su dang ni ma skyes dgra/ lha sbyin dang ni sor mo 'phreng / lus dang sems kyis sdig pyad pas/ dmyal ba mnar myed ltung 'od kyang / phyogs bcu dus su rgyal ba la/ dad pa
282b1(mdo): bskyed de phyag 'tshal phyir/ thub pa mya ngan 'da' ba'i khar/ bskal pa grangs myed phyir bshol lo// ma ga nga'i skye bo dag/ kund kyang byang chub sems bskyed pa 'ang / phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la gus
282b2(mdo): par phyag bya ba'i dbang gis so// ko'u di n+ya las sogs pa dang / nyan thos lnga brgya rnams dag gis/ ma 'ongs dus su 'tshang rgya ba 'am// phyogs bcu'i dus gsum rgyal ba ya/ gus par phyag bya ba'i dbang gis
282b3(mdo): so// mu stegs dang ni bram ze dang / sngags 'chang chen po drang srong bcu/ da ltar dgra bcom grub pa yang // 'das pa'i phyogs bcu dus gsum ki/ rgyal ba rnams la phyag bya'i yon/ dam pa'i don la
282b4(mdo): chung pa dang / phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i zhing rnams la// byA ngang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad// tshe dpag byed par skyes pa yang // phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la// gus
282b5(mdo): par phyag bya'i dbang gis so// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ sngon nga rgyal po byed pa ni// drang srong chen po sbyin zhes bya// / de'i tshe sangs rgyas ma byung ste// / bram ze lnga brgya rnams zhig
282b6(mdo): // kha zas dang ni gos rnams// khang khyim dang mal cha'i bar/ lo grangs nyi shu tshang bar du// rab tu byung ba'i mchod pa du la/ ngas ni de tshe bsgoms pa la/ khyed rnams byang chub
282b7(mdo): sems dpa' bskyed cig/ bram ze lnga brgya de dag gis// mchod pa phul ba blangs kyis kyang // dkon mchog gsum la ma dad pas// mdo bzhin da la slar smras pa/ 'jig rten nang na byang
282b8(mdo): chub dang // rnam par grol ba myed do zhes// de skad smras pa nga thos nas// mnyam nyid mdo sde bsrung ba'i phyir// bram ze lnga brgya'i srog gcod do// bram ze de dag tshe 'phos nas// dmyal
282b9(mdo): ba mnar myed ltung bar 'gyur// sems can dmyal bar ltung nas su// dran pa rnam gsum g.yos nas kyang // sum gsum rgyal ba phyag byas so// mnyam pa nyid kyis mdo sde dang /
283a1(mdo): byang chub dge 'dun dang bskyed do// dran pa rnams sum byas nas su// mod la dmal nas byung ste dong // 'jig rten zil dang rnga ru skyes// tshe ni bskal pa chung bcu thub// de yang gus pa'i sems
283a2(mdo): kyis su// phyogs bcu'i rgyal la phyag bya'i yon// bram ze de dag thams cad kyis// thog ma bskur pas dmyal su yang // phyis ni dad pas mod la thar// byang chub sems dpa' byed rnams ni// khrel dang
283a3(mdo): ldan pa smos ci dgos// sdig gi rang bzhin thog ma nas// myed pas sems can rnams kyi phyir// rtsa ba bzhi po'i sdom pa dang // mtshams myed lnga po'i sdig rnams kyang // log spyod rab tu 'thol bshags so//
283a4(mdo): so so'i skye bo la la zhig/ de lta bu'i sdig byas pa// de bzhi na mthol tshangs byed nus na// rtsa ba bzhi dang mtshams myed lnga// log spyod par tu sdig 'byang ste// sangs rgyas 'grub pa 'ang
283a5(mdo): gdon myi za// ma dad pa ni der ma gtogs// gang zhig dad pa'o// sems shes de/ rgyal ba rnams la phyag byas na// chos las myi / 'grub myi sred do// de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang myi gsum stong
283a6(mdo): po'i myi rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol te// bdag cag rnams sangs rgyas grub na skya shi las// 'khor ba'i rnam pa bsgral par smon// lha myi'i nang na
283a7(mdo): btsun bzhugs pas// bye brag phyed par bshad du gsol// des gzungs su bzung ba dang / yi ker bris shing klog 'chang ba// de'i bsod nams ji tsam mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/
283a8(mdo): bye brag byed par ngas bshad kyis// rgyal bu dge mthong lags par nyon// gang zhig rin ce na sna bdun gyis// stong khams gang ba'i sems can la// sbyin pa byas shing yon phul nas// de'i steng du chos bshad
283a9(mdo): cing // dgra bcom 'bras bu thob byas pas// la la zhig gyis rgyal ba'i mtshan// zos nas dad pa'i sems bskyed de// skad cig dus su phyag byas na// de'i bsod nams de las 'da'// yi ger bris shing
283b1(mdo): grog 'chang dang // dad pas phyag 'tshal spos ci dgos// de'i bsod nams dpag tu myed// gang gis yi ger bris pa dang // klog pa ni 'dod pa dang // dus su phyag 'tshal sems bskyed na// mchod rten
283b2(mdo): stong khams chung bar du/ bzigs pa'i bsod nams pas ni che// de nas 'od srung chen po dang // sha ri'i bu dang kun dga' bo// mchod rtend srung ba mthu bo che// tshangs lha rnams dang lha dbang po// 'khor los sgyur
283b3(mdo): rang rgyal cher bzhis// bcom ldan zhabs la mgos btud nas// tshig mthun par ni 'di skad gsol // bcom ldan mya ngan 'das spang na// bdag cag rnams kyis sems can la// khyab par spel gyi
283b4(mdo): bstanang par bgyi// sus sems rtag tu bde ba'i phyir// phyag 'tshal rnams la bsrung bar bgyi// gang zhig sdom pa zhig padang / mtshams myed lnga'i sdig pa dang / mnyam pa nyid la bskur/
283b5(mdo): ba rnams// sangs rgyas de dag mtshan thos pas// rnam da// ga sa ru bde bar gnas// dper na rgyal bu dge mthong bzhin// da dung ma 'ongs phyir dus la// sangs rgyas rang bzhin mthong
283b6(mdo): bar ro// bcom ldan 'das shig kya thub pas tshogs chen po rnam sa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byed rnams legs par nyon cig/ khyed rnams la sngon byung ba'i las kyi rgyu rkyen bshad par
283b7(mdo): bya'o// nga sngon bskal pa dpag tu myed pa'i sngon rol na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mdzes pa'i 'od ces bya ba las// phyogs bcu dus gsum gi sangs rgyas rnams
283b8(mdo): kyis mtshan thos nas shin tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ thal mo sbyar cing spyi bo nas blangs so// blangs nas kyang sems can gang nas gang du gnas pa de dang der dpag tu myed pa mtha' yas pa'i sems can rnams
283b9(mdo): rgya cher spel cing bstan te// sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos pa bya'o// de'i tshe ro'i dus na tshogs rnams kyi nang du myi sum stong nyi tshe zhig/ nga'i chos kyi don dang mthun te// dad pa'i sems dpag tu myed pa skyes nas/
284a1(mdo): nga'i thar du sangs rgyas de rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod cing phyag byas pas// da ltar phyogs bcur snang zhing mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yin no// rigs kyi bu dag tsha ba bzhi dang / mchis myed pa'i sdig lci ba dang // mnyam nyid//
284a2(mdo): la bskur pa dang / log spyod kyi bar du sdig 'byang bar 'dod na// dad pa'i sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang 'di lta ste/ gang la las ma dad cing ma gus pas// mdo sde bcu gnyis la bskur cing dbang
284a3(mdo): bza' ba dang / rdo rje'i sku dang / skyes bu dam pa 'jam dpal dang // phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rnams la bskur cing dbang bza' ba'i rnams// gdon myi za bar sems can dmyal bar ltung ste/ brdzun pa ma yin no//
284a4(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ma dad pa'i phyir ro// dam pa'i chos la ba skur pa'i phyir ro// bla ma rnams la brnyas pa'i phyir ro// phyogs bcu'i dus gsum gi sangs rgyas la spang ba'i phyir te/ nges par
284a5(mdo): dmyal bar ltung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'di dag la dad cing / sems thag pa nas phyag 'tshal nas// myi dge ba bcu dang mtsha mas myed pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la bskur po'i sdig lta zhig
284a6(mdo): myi 'byung myi srid de ma dad pa dang / ma gus pa dang / dge ba'i rtse pa rgyun chad pa dang / log spyod rnams ni der ma gtogs so// rigs kyi bu dag shag kya thub pa'i sku 'bum phrag brgyar spruld pa
284a7(mdo): yang // 'jig rten gi khams re re na ston pa mdzad cing bzhugs te tha ma'i sku ra ya na no// de'i tsher dang 'grogs pa myi sum stong po kun da ltar sangs rgyas su 'grub ste/ stong dang po'i gtso bo ni sangs rgyas pad ma ces bya/
284a8(mdo): stong bar ma'i gtso bo na sangs rgyas rdo rje sku zhes bya// stong tha ma'i gtso bo ni sangs rgyas byams pa shes bya'o// de bas na khyod rnams kyang de bzhin du phyogs bcu dus gsum gi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan brjod cing phyag 'tshal
284a9(mdo): ba rigs so// byed napa sa 'odas pa'i dus chogs mang po rnams la bkod pa rgya ra byed cing byed par 'byed pa'i sems cas rnams la yan btags te/ 'ams su ma das babs zhing / 'i ba dang / bden pa'igadas/
284b1(mdo): su dkyil 'khor gis sa dang 'dra bar byos shig// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs 'dzinang spyand las langs te// bla gos zag pa gcig tu gabar nas// pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te// bcom/
284b2(mdo): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyard cing phyag 'tshal nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myi ci lags// ci ltar gzung bar bgyis/ ji ltar
284b3(mdo): bsgom zhing spyod par bgyi// de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mying ni sdom pa lci ba rnams la phan 'dogs pa'o zhes zung shig/ rdo rje rim
284b4(mdo): po che'i snying po'o zhes bya bar zung shig/ sde snod kyi sgo dpag tu myed pa'o zhes bya bar zung shig// thams cad kun tu bsdus pa'o// zhes bya bar zung shig/ rgya chen po dpa' zla myed pa'o zhes bya bar
284b5(mdo): zung shig// myi sum stong sangs rgyas su grub pa rnam par bkod/ pa'o zhes bya bar zung shig/ 'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs te// // bsod nams thob pa'o zhes bya bar zung shig thar pa chen po phyogs
284b6(mdo): su rgyas pa'o zhes bya bar zung shig// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' gzungs 'dzind 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bstand pa ltar na
284b7(mdo): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems cad dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams la sman pa dang / bde ba chen po mdzad pa'i slad du// sdig sbyangs pa dang / sangs rgyas su 'grub par mdzad pa'i mdo sde ni// sangs rgyas thams cad
284b8(mdo): kyi yum mo// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam mo// nyan thos rnams kyi ni myog go// dang myi rnams kyi ni'ang khyim lags te/ de lta bu bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i don dang ldan pa// bdag gis
284b9(mdo): gzungs su bzung bar bgyi'o// lha dang mye gang nas gang du gnas pa de dang der rgya cher spel bar bgyi'o// rgyun myi 'chad cing yun du gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// legs so
285a1(mdo): legs so// khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yin te/ sde snod chen po dpag tu myed pa thams cad gzungs su 'dzind pa legs te/ khyed ma 'ongs po'i dus na// nga dang 'gro ba'i gnas su khyod 'gro shag/ nga
285a2(mdo): 'dug pa'i gnas su khyod 'dug shig// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnams grangs 'di bstand pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu byed pa zhig phyir myi ldog pa dang / myi 'gyur ba'i sar gnas so// nyan
285a3(mdo): zos brgyad khri zhig theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do// dge slong stong phrag bcu zhig dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// lha dang myi brgyad khri bzhi stong zhig chos kyi myig rnam par dag pa thob bo// sems can stong phrag
285a4(mdo): brgya zhig ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di bshad zin nas/ shing sa la ka de logs su gshegs so// gshegs nas gsar
285a5(mdo): gser gi me tog rin po che'i rdzing bu dang / bcas par mya snang ba/ ra gyurd to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyang bsdus nas/ myaM mjed gi 'jig rten gi mthon dman dang // gtsang sme yang sngon
285a6(mdo): bzhin no// myi rnams nyes byed pa'i phyir// dmyal ba na yang sngon bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa la nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang / lha dang / myi
285a7(mdo): dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa ma dad pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'o//
285a8(mdo): rdzogs s+ho// / rgya kar skad du/ a r+ya sarba ta tha ga ta A dISh+Ta na// sad ta a lo ka na/ bud d+ha k+She te san dar sha nA byAng ha nan ma ma ha ya na su tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs
285a9(mdo): pa thams cad kyi byin kyi brlabs sems can la gzigs shing // sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad phyag 'tshal lo//
285b1(mdo): 'di skad bdag gis bos pa dus cig na// bcom ldan 'das ni 'bru 'dzin na// 'phags pa sun ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas// sA li dong bu rin po che dpal kyi snying po dang // me tog rgyas pa dang / lwa'u
285b2(mdo): seng ge'i khri bkod pa nA/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gis dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa thad pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ga stag dang // byang chub se/
285b3(mdo): dpa' thams cad kyang snying rje cher po'i shes pa la gnas pa// thams cad kyang skye ba cig gis sogs pa dang / skye ba gnyis dang / skye ba gsum dang / skye ba bcu dang / skye ba nyi shu dang / skye ba sum bcu dang // skye ba brgyan
285b4(mdo): bar dag gis thogs pa// thams cad kyang sa brgyad pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas pa sha stag ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs bang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / dri myed tog dang / nor dpal dang
285b5(mdo): klog gtog dang / dro myed 'od dang / can dran dang / bdud rtsi'i tog la stsogs pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// / bdun brgyal dang // dge snyen dang / dge bsnyen ma thams cad
285b6(mdo): kyang lung bstanang pa dang ldan pa// ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ 'garten gi khams pa dad pa nas 'dus pa lnga stong dang / lha dang / ku da gnod sbyin dang / rje 'a thams cad kyang sngon gi sangs rgyas la bsnyen
285b7(mdo): bkur byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe 'phrul mthong ba brgyad stong dang // gnod sbyin mo chen mo thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes thob pa// lung skor pa thob pa// phyir gyi ldog pa/ dpe 'a byed pa dang /
285b8(mdo): dri byed 'od dang / 'od can ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / 'phrog ma dang / dung can ma las phrogs pa gnod sbyin mo chen mo brgyad cu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang /
285b9(mdo): yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / myig myi babang dang / nor bu bzang po'i bu dang / gang ba bzang po'i las sogs pa 'jig rten skyong thams cad kyi bar dag dang thams cad du bzhugs so// de nas de
286a1(mdo): dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i khri la bzhugs par rig nas/ rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la// lho'i rgyan dang / na bza' dang / me tog dang / me tog
286a2(mdo): 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod par byas ri mor byas so// kho cig gis ni lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor bar byas te bstod do// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sems can
286a3(mdo): thams cad la dbyigs pa snying rje chen po'ishes pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus stong sum gi stong chen po la 'jig rten gi khams 'di 'od kyis sdang bar
286a4(mdo): gyur cig/ gzugs thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par gyur da nas// sems can dmus long gang yin pa de dag gis nr-i// myi ga gis gzugs rnams mthong bar gyur pa to// 'on pa rnams
286a5(mdo): kyi rna bas ni sgra dag ni thos par gyur to// nad kyis btab pa// rnams ni nad dag dang bral bar gyur to// gos myed pa ni gos dag thob par gyur to// spyod pa rnams ni dran pa thob par gyur to/
286a6(mdo): lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni// lus dang dbang po yongs su rdzogs par gyur da to// dbul po rnams kyis ni nor dag thob par gyurd to// sems can gang dag nor dang / yo byad
286a7(mdo): dang / longs spyod myed pa de dag ni nor dang yo byad dang / longs spyod dag dang ldan par gyur da to// sems can thams cad kyang bde ba thams cad dang ldan zhing // bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur
286a8(mdo): to// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad la yang dag par bskul nas// thams cad chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te// sems
286a9(mdo): can gang dag lha rnams kyi nang na skyes pa de dag thams cad kyis ni lha'i bde ba yongs su spangs nas// sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byas te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan ga la ba der lpags so// sems
286b1(mdo): can gang dag myi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag gis kyang // mye'i bde ba yongs su spangs nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// sems can gang dag klu dang gnod sbyin dang /
286b2(mdo): srin po dang / yaM dag dang / sha za rnams kyi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag kyis kyang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa so sor thob nas/ sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa dang / lus dang sems bde
286b3(mdo): bar gyur nas// chos mnyan pa'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang lhags so// sems can gang dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su mun pa mun nag gi nang du skyes pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus
286b4(mdo): yud tsam zhig gis dran pa so sor thob nas// gcig gis ga cag gis kun tu shes par gyur da te// de dag mun pa chen po de nas yo ras su tha rad par gyur da to// sems can thams cad gcig la
286b5(mdo): gcig byams par gnas shing nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang / bral bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu ra/ ba tu g.yos so// mtho ba dang dma' bar yang gyur da te// de
286b6(mdo): nas 'khor 'dus pa des 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur da pa 'dus te/ 'dug par gyur nas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di
286b7(mdo): skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po kun tu snang zhing // 'dus pa chen po'i ltas kyang kun tu snang la/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po
286b8(mdo): ngag lung bstand pa yang kun tu snang zhing // chos kyi 'brel pa'i gtam chen po'i sde ltas kyang kun tu snang ba las na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gi re ba thams cad yongs
286b9(mdo): su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing ye shes chen po yang 'thob par 'gyur gyis// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis sems can thams cad la snying rje skyed la/ phan pa dang bde ba dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
287a1(mdo): la bkod par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus shig/ rigs kyi bu phyi ma'i dus phye ma'i tshe na/ sems can sdig pa byed pa/ dbul ba nyams chung ba/ lus mdog ngan pa/
287a2(mdo): rga ba dang / na pas yongs su gzir ba// longs spyod chung ba/ lus yongs su ma bsgoms pa/ tshe thung ba blo chung ba/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis yongs su gzi rad pa dag kyang 'byung ba yin
287a3(mdo): te// rigs kyi bu de dag gi don tu chos bstand par bgyi ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob cig dang / rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis yun ring por sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang /
287a4(mdo): bde ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sdig pa thams cad bzlog par bya ba dang / sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / pra
287a5(mdo): na myed pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bo'i bar dag byas par/ 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur rnam
287a6(mdo): par bltas te// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag yid la byas nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba de log sa su thal mo sbyar ba btud de lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/
287a7(mdo): yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bla ma'i dus slad ma'i che na/ sems can rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan gis gnod par gyur pa/
287a8(mdo): dus ma lags par 'gum pas yongs su gzir/ nyam chung ba mdog ngan pa/ tshe thung ba/ longs spyod chung ba/ lus yongs su ma bsgoms pa dag 'byung ba mchis te/ de dag ni ser sna dang 'chal po'i tshul
287a9(mdo): khrims kyi sems kyis gcig sa cig 'gum par 'gyur la// gcig gis gcig gi nor dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dag 'thogs par 'gyur zhing / gad mo dang / 'jog skyeg dang / bro gar dang / rtsed mo
287b1(mdo): ngag gis mngon par rtse ba dang / myi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / myi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa bgyid pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de dag rgyud dang gzhi des/ sems can rnams la myi dge/
287b2(mdo): ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis gtses nas/ sems cad dpyal pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag du yang skye bar 'gyur lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag de dag gi don
287b3(mdo): sman pa dang / bde ba dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par bgyi ba'i dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar bgyi ba dang // sdig pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi
287b4(mdo): pa'i sred du de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa 'debs par 'tshal gyis// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la ni myi mkhyend pa dang / ma rtogs pa dang / ma gzigs pa dang / ma gsan pa dang / rnam par myi
287b5(mdo): mkhye nad pa ci yid myi mang bas/ chos kyi 'brel pa'i gtam/ nyand par 'chal pa dang / sngon gi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bgyi/ sa pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can gi byang chub
287b6(mdo): sems dpa' dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / ku dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi
287b7(mdo): 'am ci dang / lto 'pho chen po mang po lpags pa 'di dag re ba ma mchis par gyu ra cig/ slar mchis par myi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol// dra nas
287b8(mdo): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag gis kyang yan lag lngas phyag byas te// tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs par bshad du gsol// bde bar gshegs/
287b9(mdo): pa legs par bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas// phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs te// snyan cing 'jebs la yid
288a1(mdo): du 'ong ba'i gsung dbyangs kyis// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan rab gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa
288a2(mdo): thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs sems can la gzigs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa kun tu stond pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod da/ des sngon dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa me
288a3(mdo): tog snang ba kun tu stond pa zhes bya ba'i spyan sngar de thos so// rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzind de'i myi thos ma thag tu/ sems can bye ba phrag dgu bcus de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par gyur da nas/ thams cad
288a4(mdo): kyang de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu lung bstand te// ngas kyang lung bstand pa thos so// rigs kyi bu ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i lho'i mkhyend pas/ sngon de bzhin gshegs
288a5(mdo): pa sum khris sems can thams cad kyi don du/ chos kyi rnam gra// ngas 'di bshad de// thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa la ga/ sol ba 'debs pa ni/ 'phags pa spyad ras gzigs dbang
288a6(mdo): phyug khyod nyid dang / 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur da pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rnams dang / dge srong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i
288a7(mdo): 'khor ji ltar lhags pa 'di dag gyis kyang thos nas ri mo dang mchod pa dag bya ste// de'i 'og tu sems can bye ba khrag thig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis lung bstand pa thob cing // byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dag
288a8(mdo): kyang thob par gyur pa nas// 'dod pa thams cad du 'gro ba dang / re ba thams cad grub pa dang / rang rnams dang bral bar yang gyur la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su sbyi nad pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa
288a9(mdo): dang / gzugs bzang zhing mdzes na// blta na sdug pa dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bar ba rnams 'byor da pa dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po rnams kyis mngon par bstod par 'os pa dang /
288b1(mdo): sems can thams cad kyi phyag bya bar 'os pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dum la dad pa'i myi byed pa dang ldan pas/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa dang / tshe dpa'
288b2(mdo): dog dang / gzi brji dang / mthu stobs dang ldan zhing / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par gyur da te// nam yang sdug bsngal bar ma gyurd cing // sdug pa'i sdug bsngal myed par gyur pa de dran te/ rigs kyi
288b3(mdo): bu de ltar na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos smra ba de la mchog tu gus pa'o sems bskyed de// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yan lag lngas phyag byas shing / me tog dang / gdug spos dang / spos
288b4(mdo): dang / me tog 'breng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis lags par brgyan nas// sangs rgyas sa phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod cing / phyag 'tshal bar byed pa
288b5(mdo): dang / legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par byed pa dang / 'dzind pa ra// pa/ 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger / drir 'jug pa de dag ni yon tan mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
288b6(mdo): de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la yang yon mang po dang ldan par gyurd te/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la lha na sdug pa dang / nad rnams dang bral ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / blo brtan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang
288b7(mdo): brtan pa dang ldan pa dang // rgyal po thams cad dang / rgyal po'i btsun mo thams cad dang / rgyal bu thams cad dang / blon po thams cad dang / dgra thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bstod par
288b8(mdo): 'os pa dang / phyag bya bar 'os pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'os par 'gyur ro// nor dang yo byad mang por yang 'gyur ro// bdag de dag gi kha nas tsan gri dri dad 'byung bar yang 'gyur ro// myig ud pa la sngon po'i 'dag
288b9(mdo): ma 'dra bar yang 'gyur ro// de dag gis nyin mtshan du sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpal dag mthong bar 'gyur ro// mtshams myed pa lnga las sogs pa byas pa'i slob pa thams cad zad par yang 'gyur ro//
289a1(mdo): de dag la lha rnams srung bar 'gyur ro// de dag 'chi ba'i dus na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag mthong bar 'gyur ro// phra dog myed pa dang sems rnam par g.yeng ba myed par 'chi ba'i dus byed/
289a2(mdo): par yang 'gyur ro// shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gi khams bde ba can du skye ba'i bar du 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzind pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas te yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ge ra 'dra
289a3(mdo): 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang mchod par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / mying tsam thos par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ ngas mngon sum du bstand pas lung bsta nad pa yin te// de dag gis nga mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byas/ ri mor
289a4(mdo): byas mchod pa byas pa yin pas/ de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la the tsom bskyed par myi bya'o// gang dag gi rma lam du grags par gyu rad pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' yin par yid la byas
289a5(mdo): bsnyen bkur bya'o// de'i sngon gi las kyi rnam par smyin pas ga/ zigs myi mdzes pa dang / longs spyod myed pa dang / blo myod pa dang // sred pa che ba dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang / rgyal srid 'khrugs
289a6(mdo): par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag dang / glad pa na ba gang yin pa dang zan chad pa gang yin pa dang // gos ngan par gyur da pa gang yin pa dang / lus dang sems la gnod pa gang yin pa dang / reg na myi
289a7(mdo): bde ba'i mal bcas pa gang yin pa dang / spyod pa gang yin pa'i las kyi sgrib pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pa'i mthu' yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// des kyang sems 'di ltar bskyed par byas te/
289a8(mdo): bdag gis sngon 'khor bar 'khor ba'i tshe// sems can rnams la sdig pa myi dge ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs bstsogs pa de dag so sor bshags par bya'o// bsal bar bya'o// myi 'chab par bya'o// sangs rgyas
289a9(mdo): dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dad pa myi byed pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i longs spyod kyi 'bras bu myed par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang / sangs rgyas dang /
289b1(mdo): chos dang / dge 'dun dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag dang / pha ma dag la sdig pa'i las byas shing bstsags par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur zhing // dbang phyug chen po dag
289b2(mdo): kyang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i sems cad dmyal ba de'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang / sdug pa dang bral bar gyur du pa dang / dmus long du 'gyur
289b3(mdo): pa dang / bud byed gi dngos por 'gyur ba dang / mtshan gnyis par 'gyur ba dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba'i dbang gis gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 'gyur ba gang yin pa
289b4(mdo): de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na ting nge 'dzind 'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin no// rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun rin du gnas
289b5(mdo): par byed pa dang // rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la pa/ srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par byed pa dang / de dag thams cad kyi yon tan dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed
289b6(mdo): pa dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / bde ba chen por bya da pa dang / bsams pa dang / 'dod pa thams cad yang dag par 'gru ba par byed pa dang / las thams cad zad par byed pa dang / dus
289b7(mdo): ma yin par 'chi ba dang / skyis ma ngan pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / g.yul thams cad las rgyal bar byed pa dang / che dang mdog dang stobs dang / brtsod 'grus dang / mthu che bar
289b8(mdo): byed pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / mye dang / myi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du byed pa dang / rims dang / dug dang / mye dang / chu thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / lung bstan pa'i bar dag thob
289b9(mdo): par byed pa'i gzungs kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag yod de/ de dag mnyan cing bzung ste/ bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi sku
290a1(mdo): mo de dag ni yon tan de dag thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug du rab tu g.yos pa dang / ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang // de bzhin gshegs
290a2(mdo): pa'i sku la me tog dang / gdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / ras bcos bu zung dag gsol da te/ legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das legs so/
290a3(mdo): legs so// gzungs kyi gsar sngags kyi gzha de dag gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ na ma sarba ta tha ga ta nan/ tad h+ya thA/ pUd d+he/ su bud d+he/ pud d+ha ma te/ lo ga bi lo ka/
290a4(mdo): lo ga a ti ka krA te/ sa tA a ba ya ka ne/ sarba ta tha ga ta a dASh+Ta na di ShA te/ sarba A sha pa ri pU ra ne/ d+yu te na d+ha re/ na ra de ba pU dzAM te/ ta thA ga ta gnya' na da de/ ta thA gA tA a dI ShA ne na/ sarba lo kam
290a5(mdo): su khi b+ha ba tu/ pUrba ka rma kA pa ya tu/ ra kra b+hA ba tu/ sarba ye b+h+ya sta tha ga tA/ a d+hiShA ne na swa hA// kye rigs kyi bu dag gaTu/ ngas kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag naM/ de bzhin gshegs pa
290a6(mdo): sum khris gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// ngas kyang da ltar sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba dang / nad
290a7(mdo): thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar bya ba'i phyir bshad de/ grogs po dag gang la la zhig 'di snyam du bdag gis ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad
290a8(mdo): 'thob par 'gyur snyam du sems pa des/ nang par sngar langs te/ sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal dang / 'chab pa
290a9(mdo): dang / khro ba yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang / rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa shin tu rgya cher byas la/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag
290b1(mdo): byas te/ gang 'dod pa pa yid la byas nas me tog la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa la re re nas dbul bar bya'o// de nas de'i re ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ro//
290b2(mdo): lam na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar yang 'gyur// dam pa gang 'dod pa de thob par yang 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar yang 'gyur ro// shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gi khams bde ba
290b3(mdo): can du skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang stobs dang / mdog dang / brtsod 'grus dA ldan par lnga 'gyur ro// dathams cad kyang de'i dbang du 'gyuraro// gzungs 'di bshad pas na/ srog chags drug khris myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur da nas/
290b4(mdo): de dag thams cad las kyi bsgrib pa thams cad las rnam par gro la zhing bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyurd te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes
290b5(mdo): phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// bcom ldan 'das la 'di/ skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam bcas pa/ myi 'jigs pa'i gzi brjid ces brgya
290b6(mdo): ba'i gzungs mchis te/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig sa myed bkod pa gzi brjid rgyal po'i spyan sngar de gzung lags so// bzung nas kyang sems can thams cad la bshad lags so//
290b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad bdag gi mngon par 'tshal te// gang gi na lam du gzungs de grag par gyurd tam/ gro bar chud par gyur pa de'i lus la chung ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs sam// bro nad dam/
290b8(mdo): rims sam/ lus bro 'tshal ba 'am/ sems gdung ba 'am/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa 'am/ 'chab kyis 'jigs pa 'am/ mtshon gyis 'jigs pa 'am/ dug gis 'jigs pa 'am/ dug sbyar
290b9(mdo): mas 'jigs pa 'am/ mkha' 'gro ma 'am/ 'byung pos 'jigs pa 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dgra rnams sam/ mye dang myi ma lags pa dag gis/ tho 'tsham pa 'am rnam par gtse ba 'am/ gnod pa bgyid
291a1(mdo): par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma mchis lags so// de'i srad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang ba gsal cig dang / bdag gis chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa de dag gi don du nyan pa
291a2(mdo): rnams dang / ri mo bgyid pa rnams dang / mchod par bgyid pa rnams dang / 'dzind par bgyid pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam bcas pa'i phyag
291a3(mdo): rgya dag stsa lad par bgyi'o// na ma sarba ta tha ga ta nan/ sarba bo d+ha sa twa nanA/ a ri he tA na/ tad t+ya thA/ oM ba dz+ra d+ha ra/ ba dz+ra ka ya/ badz+ra ba la/ badz+ra te dzAH/ hUM hUM/ badz+ra po nai/ ta tha ga ta ad nyam pa la
291a4(mdo): yang / s+phA ra phrad tid nyam/ sarba bya d+hin sarba pa pA nai nA sha ya/ de hi maM/ ya the ba si ta ba pa ram yan ya me/ ba a b+hi prA yan yan yA tsa mi tan ta me ba so mr-id d+ha tu/ he he/ tu ru tu ru/ a kad tsa a gang
291a5(mdo): cha/ mA bi lam pa/ da ra~M sha ya badz+ra kA ya ma/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha/ ne nA sA hA/ gzungs 'di brjod pa na sa chen po 'di mtho ba da/ ra dma' bar gyurd to// gnod sbyin dang / sring po thams cad
291a6(mdo): kyang rab tu sngangs so// lha thams cad dang phyi dang myi ma yin pa'i bar dag kyang ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ sems cad chen po rab tu grub par byed pa'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag
291a7(mdo): bshad pa ni/ leg so legs so// zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsolang to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la
291a8(mdo): la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'am/ nor dang 'bru dang / longs spyod kyi dbang phyug gas/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gam/ rigs sngags 'chang nyid dam/ tshe dang stobs dang / mdog dang / brtson 'grus
291a9(mdo): dang / tshe ring po nyid 'tshal ba des/ snga nas bsnyen bgyis la dgung bla yang gi ngo ches brgyad la tsan dan dkar po las rdo rje 'dzind pa rta gang du dgod cing / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa snying kar sku gdung phul pa sku
291b1(mdo): gdung bcas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa/ rigs sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byid par bgyid pa bgyis la/ gtsang bas bdug pos bdug cing / gdugs mtshan gcig du spung ba bgyis ya de nas ches/
291b2(mdo): brgyad nas ches bco lnga'i bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bzhugs pa'i gnas gtsang mar cad dkar po'i dkyil 'khor dkyis la/ bum pa gang ba bzhi yang gzhag par bgyi/ phyogs bzhir yang ro dang
291b3(mdo): ldan pa dang / dri dang ldan pa dang / skyabs dang / 'o thug gi gtor ma dag stsal la/ ras gos dkar po bgos te/ sems che cig tu bgyis nas dus gsum du bdug spos dang / me tog dang / spos dang
291b4(mdo): mar me dag gis mchod pa chen po bgyi zhong/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang mchod par bgyis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bgyis sna' ma'i me tog brgya cha brgyad la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad
291b5(mdo): bzlas shing / re re nas lag na rdo rje la bsdund par bgyi'o// des na sgra skad chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / dog sa g.yo ba da/ da 'od zer dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de nas dam pa
291b6(mdo): mi 'tshal ba yang su sad par bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis la sa thams cad dang dgos pa thams cad kyang yang dag par bsgrubs par 'gyur lags so// pro nad ma mchis pa dang / tshe ring
291b7(mdo): tha dang / sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar yang 'gyur zhing / yon tan stong yang thob par 'gyur lags so// 'gum pa'i tshen yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong mthong bar 'gyur lags so// bdag
291b8(mdo): mthong ba yang stsa lar par bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so// phyag rgya 'di ni lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
291b9(mdo): gyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/ 'di la som nyi myed pa dang / yid gnyis myed pa dang / the com myed par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// /
292a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs sems can la 'jigs shing // sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bgyi/
292a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin kyi brlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin kyi brlabs de las/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
292a3(mdo): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / myaM rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / dr-i za rnams dang / yaM dgas rnams dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes
292a4(mdo): pa rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i lhag pa g.yo' ba dag rab tu shes shing / sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams su nye bar
292a5(mdo): 'gro ba ste/ legs par spyod pa'i las byed pa/ sangs rgya/ sa dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la dad pa 'thob par 'gyur/ ra ba'o// 'di dag ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba ste/
292a6(mdo): nyes par spyod pa'i las byed pa/ sdig pa spyod par byed par shes nas/ sdig pa'i lte bar gyur pa po'i sems can de dag la chos stond par byed cing / sdig pa thams cad las bzlog
292a7(mdo): par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la bkod par byed pa dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal dang / khro ba dang / ser sna dag seld par byed
292a8(mdo): pa dang / sems can de dag sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dag la dad pa rab tu thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye zhing nam du yang / sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar myi 'gyur la//
292a9(mdo): yid la myi bde bar myi 'gyur bas na/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ting nge 'dzind 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin brlabs sems can la gzigs shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston
292b1(mdo): pa zhes bya ste/ 'di thob pa'i sems can rnams ni phyir myi ldog par nges pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro// gsol dpa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag lung bstand par
292b2(mdo): 'gyur lags// bcom ldan 'das dgral bcom pa nyid kyang dka' ba lags ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags na/ de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po dang dka'
292b3(mdo): myod pa ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ngas dpe sems skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu
292b4(mdo): phyi nang pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bco 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi dad pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa yongs su
292b5(mdo): rdzogs par byas pa gang yin pa dang / mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / myig dang / lus dang / sdug pa'i bu dang / bu/ mo dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / bran mo dag yongs su btang
292b6(mdo): bar gyur da pa gang yin pa bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma 'di ni/ chos kyi rnam grang sa 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
292b7(mdo): ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / 'dzind pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byas pa dang / gzhan dag la yang yang dag par byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa dang / chos
292b8(mdo): smra ba de dag la yang mchod pa byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu ngas kun chub par byas shing bshad pa'i chos de dag
292b9(mdo): thams cad la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas ste/ yi ger 'drir 'jug pa gang yin pas ni/ gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs
293a1(mdo): 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / ya~M ker 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / yang dag par stond par byed pa dang / nyan par byed na de la bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba ches mang du yongs
293a2(mdo): su sdud par 'gyur te/ des na de bzhin gshegs pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stond to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang
293a3(mdo): klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'i bsod nams ni de ltar dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag sdig pa kun tu spyod pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bro gar la
293a4(mdo): mngod par dag pa dga' ba dang / myi sdug pa la sdug par 'du she sa pa dang / 'dod pa dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems mang ba dang / myi bde ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang / mtshon cha dang / spyod pa
293a5(mdo): dang / sdig pa dang / rdeg pa la mngon par dga' ba dag dang / she sa rab myi 'gyur ba dang / yid la byed par myi 'gyur ba de dag ni sdig pa'i las kyi gzhi de dang / myi shes pa des myi dge ba'i bshes
293a6(mdo): gnyen gis yongs su zin cing / rga ba dang / na ba dang / mya ngan dang / 'chi bas yongs su zin pas/ 'tsho ba'i tshe na yongs su gdu nga bar 'gyur te/ dbyigs pa na so so nas dur khrod dang 'dra ba
293a7(mdo): kho nar mthong zhing / dge ba'i sems bskyed par yang myi 'gyur la/ dad pa myi byed pa thob par yang myi 'gyur ro// de dag de nas shi 'phos nas kyang yang sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas sus
293a8(mdo): bstand pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba myed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba dang / lung bstand pa ma thos pa dag gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / gzung
293a9(mdo): ba dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / dang par yang myi nus la/ chos smra ba de la yang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par yang myi nus so//
293b1(mdo): rigs kyi bu gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i yul der ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas ji ltar lpags pa'i 'khor de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so//
293b2(mdo): zhes bya ba gsol te// bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos smra ba de dang / chos nyan pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pas bsnyen bkur bgyi/ bla
293b3(mdo): mar bgyi/ mchod par bgyi zhing / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi lags so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang rgyas par bgyi// bsrung bar bgyi ste/ de nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
293b4(mdo): yun ring du gnas par yang 'gyur lags so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis// jis lhags pa'i 'khor rnams la rnam par gzigs te/ bka' stsal pa/ kye rigs kyi bu dag legs so lags so//
293b5(mdo): khyod cag gis de bzhin du kris shig// gnod par byed pa pa/ bsdus pa dang / gshes pa dang / sdigs pa dang / mtsho/ na 'byin pa dang / rgyu bar byed na yang / sus dang srog sa skye
293b6(mdo): lta bar byas la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ yi ger 'dring 'jug par bya/ grag par bya'o// chos smra ba de la yang bde ba'i yo byad thams cid kyis rim 'gror bya'o/
293b7(mdo): yul phyogs de dang / gling de dang / grong khyer de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrugs pa dag las bsrung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang rtag
293b8(mdo): par rgyun tu bsam par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag bka' stsal to// bskal pa grangs myed stong phrag bye snyed du/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba lan 'ga' steng pa lta/
293b9(mdo): phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod par myi 'gyur bar/ rigs kyi bu rnams bag yod chos nyon cig/ yon tan nyan cing mngon par dad byed pa// de dag gis ni ting 'dzin skad mya dka'// gang gis rkang gtso rnams la ni/
294a1(mdo): bskal pa bye ba gang ga'i bye snyed du/ nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos dang rgyan// spos dang 'phreng ba byug pa phul ba pas/ gang gis mdo sde 'di la dang byas te// nyan cing klog la yi ger 'dra
294a2(mdo): byed pa/ de la bsod nams tshad ni yod myin te/ bde bar gshegs pas de snyed tshad ma gsungs/ rtag tu bag yod dgon par sten byed cing // sems can gzhan myed bsam gtan rtag sgom dang // sdug pa'i
294a3(mdo): bu dang bu mo sbyin byed cing / lag pa rkang pa yongs su gtong ba pas// gang su mdo sde 'di ni 'dzind byed pa/ de bas bsod nams mang po thob// mdo mchog 'di ni nor sbyin byed pa ste/ de'i ngan song kun kyang
294a4(mdo): rtag tu spangs// 'di ni nor dang 'bru sbyin byed pa ste// gang zhig mdo sde rnam dag 'di 'dzind pa// de la yon tan kun kyang myaM dkon zhing // de la tshe stobs brtson 'grus mod pa yin/
294a5(mdo): 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'od dpag myed mthong zhing // ngas de sang // sa rgyas byang chub lung yang bstan pa// de la nam yang sdig pa yod// myin zhing // bde ba can gyis 'jig rten khams kyang mthong //
294a6(mdo): de la rtag tu las gang 'byung 'gyur ba// sems gdung lus kun na pa 'am// de bzhin glad pa na bas thams cad zad 'gyur zhing // de ni nams kyang rnam par ltung myi 'gyur// des ni mthong ba'i
294a7(mdo): chos la yon tan kun// ji ltar bsams shing 'dod pas 'thob par 'gyur// de ltar rtag tu dge slong po mo dang // dge bsnyen rnams dang rgyal pos rtag tu nI// phyi'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa ltar// chos
294a8(mdo): smra ba la rjes su gus byas te// mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu gzung bya zhing // 'dzind pa la yang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya// spos dang 'phreng ba byug pa rnams dag gis// bsnyen bkur byas te yi ger 'drir yang gzhug/
294a9(mdo): phyi ma'i dus la rga nas gdungs kyur da la/ 'khrug pa stong phrag du mas g.yen skyo zhing // sems can dmyal ba yi dgas rnams su yongs bya ba dang // 'am ma ning sman par bya ba dang / dmus long spyod dang ro dang
294b1(mdo): bya'i dri// rigs dpa' bud byed rnams su skye ba phyed// zag rog che zhing rtag tu sdig byed la// khro bas kyi sa non tag tu ser sa can// sangs rgyas chos la gus par ma byas pas// de ni de 'dra'i rigs
294b2(mdo): su skye 'gyur la// der yang sdug bsngal tshor ba myong 'gyur zhing // de ni phyi ma'i dus la'ang gdung bar 'gyur// de phyir gang dag 'dzind cing ston byed pa// de dag kyis ni rtag tu mchod par bya// gang gis
294b3(mdo): de la yongs su skyo ba dang // sred cing brdegs la bcing ba byas gyur da la// des ni snga yongs su myos pa yin// 'dzind cing bu dung byas dpal 'ang byas// bsngags pa smras na de dag gis na pas smras pa de
294b4(mdo): 'i phyir// de dag gis ni chos smra dang // gang zhig 'dzin 'dra zhi klog byed pa la// de dag la ni rtag tu bsnyen bkur zhing / tshig 'jam snyan pa'ang rgyun tu brjod par bya// de nas bya
294b5(mdo): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras ka/ thigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
